title: Number of Methuen businesses closed amid human trafficking investigation now up to 5
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime The city’s mayor suggested a crackdown on landlords and alleged sex buyers could be next.
By Abby Patkin October 1, 2025 | 10:09 AM 1 minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Methuen officials have shut down three more spas accused of operating as fronts for human trafficking, bringing the total number of shuttered establishments to five in the city’s latest crackdown.

title: Fall in New England has never looked this good
author: Boston.com Staff
bullets: Scenic Six Get five days of New England travel tips with Fall Field Guide.
If you ask us, New England is at its best in the fall.

From vibrant foliage and scenic drives to cozy weekend getaways, apple orchards, and the region’s best cider doughnuts, the fall is nothing short of magical — and we’re here to help you experience it all.
